Datasource.Parameter: (select geometry, type, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_landusages_gen0 order by area desc) as landusages
(select geometry, type, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_landusages_gen1 order by area desc) as landusages
(select geometry, type, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_landusages order by area desc) as landusages
(select geometry from osm_waterareas where round(st_area(geometry)) > 10000 ) as water
(select geometry from osm_waterareas where round(st_area(geometry)) > 1000 ) as water
(select geometry, type, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_landusages order by area desc) as landusages
(select type, name, geometry from osm_buildings) as foo
(select geometry, type from osm_aeroways ) as aeroway
(select geometry from osm_transport_points where type = 'turning_circle') as foo

( select geometry, type, tunnel from osm_roads where type in ('motorway', 'motorway_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link', 'primary', 'primary_link', 'secondary', 'secondary_link', 'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'road', 'residential', 'unknown', 'unclassified', 'living_street', 'service') order by z_order) as road
(select geometry, type,bridge,tunnel from osm_roads_gen1) as road
(select geometry, type,bridge,tunnel from osm_roads_gen0) as road
(select geometry from osm_transport_points where type = 'turning_circle') as foo
(select geometry, type, bridge, z_order from osm_roads where bridge = 1 order by z_order) as road
(select geometry, type, name, z_order, population from osm_places order by z_order, population desc ) as places
(select geometry, type, name, ref, oneway from osm_motorways where name is not null or ref is not null or oneway = 1 ) as label
(select geometry, type, name, oneway from osm_mainroads where name is not null or oneway = 1 ) as label
(select geometry, type, name, oneway from osm_minorroads where name is not null or oneway = 1 ) as label
(select geometry, type, name, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_landusages where name is not null order by area desc) as label
(select geometry, name, round(st_area(geometry)) as area from osm_waterareas where type != 'riverbank' and name is not null ) as label
(select geometry, type, name, round(st_length(geometry)) as length from osm_waterways where type in ('canal', 'river', 'stream') and name is not null ) as label
